name: Bazookoil GJDQ version
description:
An upgrade to the first game I uploaded to itch.io: Bazookoil! It's still incomplete, but as of now it's a lot better than it was, and I thought that it would be interesting to try and speedrun it.

The arrow keys move you, Z is jump, and X is fire. Now you can use the arrow keys while recoiling to have some control over how you move, allowing you to change direction or even pressing down to slow yourself to a full stop.
